GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18 to before v5.18.6
GSD.description:
netfs: Fix gcc-12 warning by embedding vfs inode in netfs_i_context

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.6 by commit 44db13d252a202be58afe4a1b5f507779c40501c, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit bc899ee1c898e520574ff4d99356eb2e724a9265. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: netfs: Fix gcc-12 warning by embedding vfs inode in netfs_i_context
